title: Gate 1 Manual Validation Scripts
description:
Created manual validation scripts for Gate 1 testing.

## Scripts Created
```
tests/manual/
├── step1_verify_fixtures.py      # Load TL/WH fixtures, verify structure
├── step2_detect_anomalies_cpa.py  # Detect high CPA anomalies (TL+WH)
├── step3_detect_anomalies_roas.py # Detect low ROAS anomalies (TL+WH)
├── step4_verify_ontology.py       # Test ontology grouping (TL+WH)
├── step5_verify_rca.py            # Run RCA on anomalies (TL+WH)
└── run_all_steps.py               # Execute all steps with summary
```

## Key Findings
- TL: 128 ads, 8 high CPA anomalies, 3+ low ROAS anomalies
- WH: Data loaded successfully
- All 7 ontology dimensions working
- RCA identifies root causes (engagement, creative, competitive)

## Fix Applied
- Step 5 updated to use raw metrics (CPA, ROAS) instead of pre-computed z-scores (z_cpa, z_roas)
- This ensures consistency with step 2/3 which calculate z-scores on the fly

## Usage
```bash
# Run individual steps
python3 tests/manual/step1_verify_fixtures.py
python3 tests/manual/step2_detect_anomalies_cpa.py
python3 tests/manual/step3_detect_anomalies_roas.py
python3 tests/manual/step4_verify_ontology.py
python3 tests/manual/step5_verify_rca.py

# Run all steps
python3 tests/manual/run_all_steps.py
```
